name: Strawberry Chocolate Cake
description:
This dark chocolate strawberry cake is made with 4 layers of moist dark chocolate cake and sandwiched with real fresh strawberry buttercream. It`s covered with fresh strawberry butter cream and topped with a chocolate ganache that drips beautifully for a stunning and delicious touch. Also topped with two chocolate covered strawberries.

Ingredients: Butter, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, vanilla, eggs, cocoa powder, fresh strawberry puree, dark chocolate, chocolate covered fresh strawberries, chocolate ganache

name: Date And Walnut Cake
description:
This Date and Walnut cake feature a luscious layer of vanilla cream topped with a date and walnut. Suger Treatz is an upscale coffee lounge chain in Sri Lanka with high quality coffee-based beverages, cakes, desserts and snacks. It`s desserts and cakes are rated 5 star with a strong backing of the Suger Treatz brand. 

Ingredients: Walnut,Cashew,All spice mix,Egg,Butter,Caster sugar,Dates

name: Black and white cookies
description: Visually striking, black and white cookies are deceptively simple. With a foundation of vanilla-laden “cookies” (more on that below) topped with chocolate and vanilla frosting, black and white cookies keep things simple while still creating an exciting culinary experience.

name: Hot Fudge Sundae
description: A classic dessert, this Hot Fudge Sundae is a delicious combination of ice cream and rich hot fudge. Top it with whatever your heart desires or go with the classic whipped cream, sprinkles, nuts, and a cherry. You cannot go wrong with whatever you pick!

name: Oreo Dream Extreme
description: Dream Extreme Oreo Cheesecake is a rich and fudgy cake, with a chocolate layer, Oreo Cheesecake, and Oreo Mousse, topped with a layer of chocolate ganache.

name: ChocoBerry Smoothie
description: This Chocolate Blueberry Smoothie is a Daily Harvest copycat -- a nutritional powerhouse beverage that makes a great filling breakfast or snack!
